Sentencas: For mixed conductor La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-x (LSCF) in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), cation surface segregation such as volatile Sr and consequently losing conductivity and active sites for the oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) are problematic.
Titulo: Coating internal surface of porous electrode for decreasing the ohmic resistance and shifting oxygen reduction reaction pathways in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: To mitigate the cation segregation, a practical approach is to apply a conformal surface coating.
Titulo: Coating internal surface of porous electrode for decreasing the ohmic resistance and shifting oxygen reduction reaction pathways in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Nevertheless, the coating layer would inevitably alter the ORR pathways that initially take place on the backbone surface.
Titulo: Coating internal surface of porous electrode for decreasing the ohmic resistance and shifting oxygen reduction reaction pathways in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this study, the unary electrocatalyst of Pt or CoOx was applied to the LSCF/Sm-doped CeO2 (SDC) composite electrode of inherently functional SOFCs.
Titulo: Coating internal surface of porous electrode for decreasing the ohmic resistance and shifting oxygen reduction reaction pathways in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Both ALD coating layers evolve strong interaction with the composite cathode.
Titulo: Coating internal surface of porous electrode for decreasing the ohmic resistance and shifting oxygen reduction reaction pathways in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Upon operations, the Pt coating layer remains conformal on LSCF grain surfaces but turns into discrete particles on SDC.
Titulo: Coating internal surface of porous electrode for decreasing the ohmic resistance and shifting oxygen reduction reaction pathways in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: For the CoOx coating, the conformal layer grows to be the discrete nano-grains on both the LSCF and SDC grains.
Titulo: Coating internal surface of porous electrode for decreasing the ohmic resistance and shifting oxygen reduction reaction pathways in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: ALD coating of the cathode alone reduces the cell ohmic resistance.
Titulo: Coating internal surface of porous electrode for decreasing the ohmic resistance and shifting oxygen reduction reaction pathways in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The ALDinduced conductivity change is ascribed to different mechanisms.
Titulo: Coating internal surface of porous electrode for decreasing the ohmic resistance and shifting oxygen reduction reaction pathways in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This study presents a novel and feasible approach to apply a conformal, dense coating layer on the surface of a mixed conductor, simultaneously increasing the conductivity and durability of the SOFC cathode.
Titulo: Coating internal surface of porous electrode for decreasing the ohmic resistance and shifting oxygen reduction reaction pathways in solid oxide fuel cells
